summary: Fixed sync-products API route to read and parse data/products.ts file directly instead of trying to import it. Changed from dynamic import to file read + parse approach using Function constructor. This resolves the Next.js module resolution error. The sync endpoint now works correctly.
current_status: Fixed sync endpoint by reading and parsing the products.ts file manually. Removed dynamic import that was causing build errors. Sync functionality should now work properly when clicking 'Sync from Website' button.
